coreAttributes.name: xiphos
coreAttributes.description: A double-edged, one-handed shortsword, with a straight, #IF(game.isMetricSizes())60cm#ELSE24 inch#ENDIF blade. The ancient Greeks used it as a secondary battlefield weapon after the dory or javelin.
coreAttributes.equipText: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(position)] [npc.her] xiphos at [npc.her] hip, ready to draw it at a moment's notice.

hitDescriptions.hitText: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(slash)] [npc.her] xiphos at [npc2.name], grinning as the ethereal arcane blade travels through [npc2.her] body!
Slashing out at [npc2.name] with [npc.her] xiphos, [npc.name] [npc.verb(grin)] as [npc.she] [npc.verb(see)] the ethereal blade travel straight through [npc2.her] body!
[npc.Name] [npc.verb(slash)] at [npc2.name] with [npc.her] xiphos, causing [npc2.herHim] to stagger back as the ethereal blade passes right through [npc2.her] chest!

missDescriptions.missText: Slashing out at [npc2.name] with [npc.her] xiphos, [npc.name] [npc.verb(let)] out a frustrated cry as [npc.she] [npc.verb(miss)] [npc.her] target!
With a quick step forwards, [npc.name] [npc.verb(slash)] at [npc2.name] with [npc.her] xiphos, but [npc.she] [npc.verb(miss)] [npc.her] target!
